description: "An early 18th century navigation map, with a rhumbline network and a scale in English, French, Spanish and Dutch measurements. The cartouche includes a drawing of Asian people as primitive natives, as they were often seen in the West at the time."
label: "A chart of the eastermost part of the East Indies and China, from Cape Comarine to Iapan, with all the adjacent islands / by Saml Thornton Hydrographer at the England, Scotland, and Ireland, in the Minories London."
